subject: Slate Quiz in the iOS Apps
body:
On Feb. 18, at 05:01 PM, Chris Schieffer wrote:
Hey Chris,

I’d like to introduce you to our new iOS developer, Dana, who joined last week. One of the items he’s looking into now is why the news quiz doesn’t render in the apps. He has a couple questions for you so I’ll let him take it from here.

Thanks!
Chris
